title: Window of Opportunity
description: A Michigan community is shocked when a local mother is found stabbed to death. After the case goes cold for more than a decade, a bombshell reignites the investigation. Andrea Canning reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
